_header: Master John you greeteth of Guildford tho
_description: Song in praise of God, attributed to Master John — two couplets

OxfJesus29.Transcription:
Mayster Johan eu greteþ of Guldeuorþe þoAnd
                    sendeþ eu to Seggen þat synge nul he noHe on þisse wise he
                    wille enoy his songGod Louerd of Heuene beo vs alle among
OxfJesus29.Note:
Copied in the seventeenth century by Thomas Wilkens from a
                    ‘broaken leafe’ of the same MS.
